details.title: Master Degree: Corporate Finance
details.description: Major: Quantitative Finance and modeling. Relevant courses  Quantitative methods for decisions, portfolio management, macroeconomics, microeconomics, Bayesian Data Analysis.

details.title: Bachelor Degree: Economics and Accounting
details.description: Relevant courses : VBA Programming , Accounting, macroeconomics, microeconomics, econometrics.

details.title: Alteryx Designer Advanced Certification
details.description: Earners of this certification have extensive knowledge of advanced functionality in Alteryx Designer. They are able to design analytic applications, build custom macros, analyze spatial data, perform advanced data preparation and analysis, and create reports with data visualizations. Earners have demonstrated their ability to use Designer to solve complex, real-world analytics problems.
